A SEQUEL!!! My one and only favourite!!! Hope the English translation comes soon. Only thing though, I hope they decide to uncensor this, coz the cherry on top with the 1st one was the uncensored beautiful pussies especially when Reina(?) (tanned) spread hers in the shower. So, PLEEEASE???

Reina looks a little too normal. I guess he's trying to show the passage of time by having her not dye her roots, but it just looks eh. I do like the increased makeup usage, though.  Did the first release go through much of a change before it was published? Seems to be less effort put in this time. Lot of little things, like messier lines, less shading, weaker fingernails, etc. The lack of panned out transition scenes is also kind of a bummer, I really liked those.
TRANSLATION PLEASE HAYAKUUUUU
